description: I. Business rate supplements: draft proposals on ballot and administration arrangements consultation. 53 p. II. Letter dated 14/05/2009 from Baroness Andrews to the House of Lords regarding the provision made for refunds; the use of BRS to raise debt and the power for the Greater London Authority (GLA) to pass BRS revenue on to its functional bodies. 3 p.
department: Dept for Communities and Local Government
